text: parighanaka padam (7)

(oba rag eka thula thiyana, gahanu lamayin lawa kunuharupa kiyawima wath, samalingika kriya wath anumatha nokarana bawa mata anumana karanna puluwan) namuth oba nawaka wadayehi yam yam sadhaniya lakshana dakinawa.
